title: Dhanlaxmi Bank appoints Ajith Kumar KK as MD and CEO
description: The board at its meeting held on Tuesday approved the appointment of Ajith Kumar KK as Managing Director & CEO of the bank for a period of three years with effect from June 20, 2024, and on such remuneration as approved by RBI vide letter dated April 18, it said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
